entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:46 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
